LanguageData.ReviaRaceRedHazeNeed.description: A strange, almost rabid bloodthirst grips this person. \n\nBloodstone powder appears to keep this almost uncontrollable fury away. Without it, however, this person degenerates into a berserk fury, attacking anyone and everyone around.
